name: flues
description: Flues project - C and JavaScript experiments

scripts.ghp: npm run build:all && npm run copy:www
scripts.build:all: npm run build:clarinet && npm run build:pm && npm run build:disyn
scripts.copy:www: rm -rf www/clarinet-synth www/pm-synth www/disyn && mkdir -p www/clarinet-synth www/pm-synth www/disyn && cp -r experiments/clarinet-synth/dist/. www/clarinet-synth/ && cp -r experiments/pm-synth/dist/. www/pm-synth/ && cp -r experiments/disyn/dist/. www/disyn/

author: Danny Ayers
